abstract: Zaur Dadayev, Chechen man charged with killing Russian opposition figure Boris Y Nemtsov, says he was beaten and pressured to confess.
lead_paragraph: A man charged with the killing of the opposition politician Boris Y. Nemtsov told a court on Wednesday that he had been beaten and pressured to confess.

headline.main: Russia: A Suspect Protests in Putin Foe Murder Case
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: A Suspect Protests in an Opposition Figure’s Case

snippet: A man charged with the killing of the opposition politician Boris Y. Nemtsov told a court on Wednesday that he had been beaten and pressured to confess.
